description.en:
[b][u]English[/u][/b]
Nomiya Tomomi, a high school drop-out who wants to devote his life to helping Natsumi, a girl he sentenced to a life of immobility after a tragic bike ride he invited her on, tries to change his life around, from a trouble making delinquent into a reliable man. The problem is, both Natsumi and her sister dont seem to care at all for Nomiya, rightfuly blaming him for the accident. Plus, the only notable talent Nomiya posseses is the talent for basketball. Everything changes for him when he meets up with Togawa Kiyoharu, a wheelchair basketball player.

[b][u]Portuguese / Português[/u][/b]
[spoiler]O que você faria se praticasse algum esporte que necessitasse muito das pernas e de repente se visse incapacitado de andar?, ou se a sociedade não colocasse nenhuma perspectiva de sucesso para você? Togawa Kiyoharu, Hisanobu e Nomiya Tomomi se encontram presos a esses problemas que se tornam fantasmas ou demônios que os atormentam a cada dia, e como essas histórias irão se ligar? Descubra lendo Real, uma obra do Fantástico e aclamado Takehiko Inoue criador de Slam Dunk e Vagabond!.[/spoiler]
